multimodal
Class FuzzyTime

java.lang.Object
  multimodal.FuzzyTime
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class FuzzyTime
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable

FuzzyTime tries to account for incomplete or vague time information given by the user. Depending on the input, it can define a range or a vagueness (deviation)

See Also:
